WWWOFFLE - World Wide Web Offline Explorer

WWWOFFLE CGI Program Execution Failed

Your request for URL
$decurl
could not be not be fulfilled by the WWWOFFLE server.

Help

The URL that you specified is for a local CGI program on the WWWOFFLE server. For one reason or another this program could not be succesfully executed. The possible reasons for the error include:
  • The file that contains the CGI program does not have the necessary execution permissions.
  • The CGI program encountered an error and terminated abnormally.
  • The server is running with root privileges and is configured not to run CGI programs in that case.
  • The server ran out of the necessary system resources while trying to execute the CGI program.
Check the system logfiles for more information.
